title: Foundations of Sustainable Forest Management: Solving Environmental Issues Through Mathematical Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and fundamental graph interpretation skills
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented education program learning mathematical analysis methods for forest management data, utilizing OER (Open Educational Resources)

learning_goals: Learners can convert forest area change data into tables/graphs and analyze trends.
Learners can explain the procedure for solving forest resource management problems through mathematical modeling.
Learners can perform calculations (e.g., budgeting, resource allocation) required for sustainable forest planning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
